recipes.title: Creamy Chicken Alfredo
recipes.shortDescription: Creamy parmesan Alfredo with sautéed chicken.

steps.text: Boil pasta in salted water.
Sauté diced chicken until cooked through.
Add garlic and cream, simmer until slightly thick.
Stir in parmesan, toss pasta with sauce.

recipes.title: Classic Smash Burger
recipes.shortDescription: Crispy-edged smash burgers with melted cheese.

steps.text: Heat a pan/griddle until very hot.
Form beef into 2 loose balls and smash in the pan.
Season and cook until edges are crispy, then flip.
Add cheese, toast buns, assemble and serve.

recipes.title: Avocado Toast
recipes.shortDescription: A quick, healthy toast topped with creamy avocado.

steps.text: Toast the bread until golden.
Mash avocado with salt, pepper, and lemon.
Spread on toast and finish with chili flakes.

recipes.title: Honey Garlic Salmon
recipes.shortDescription: Sticky honey-garlic glaze over tender salmon.

steps.text: Preheat oven to 200°C (400°F).
Mix honey, soy sauce, garlic, and sesame oil.
Brush glaze on salmon and bake until cooked.
Brush again, rest briefly, and serve with lemon.

recipes.title: Mediterranean Quinoa Bowl
recipes.shortDescription: Fresh veggies, feta, and quinoa with lemon dressing.

steps.text: Cook quinoa and let it cool slightly.
Chop tomatoes and cucumber; slice olives.
Mix lemon juice and olive oil for dressing.
Combine everything and top with feta.

recipes.title: Fluffy Pancakes
recipes.shortDescription: Soft, fluffy pancakes perfect with maple syrup.

steps.text: Whisk dry ingredients in a bowl.
Whisk wet ingredients, then combine gently.
Cook pancakes on a lightly oiled pan.
Serve warm with syrup or fruit.
